I.R.:

* Iron Raptor watched Quake look at the map and then thank her, waving to 
him as he scuttled out of the room.
She leaned back against the wall and looked at the holo-image of the Ark, 
wondering just what she needed to do to get it online and functional. It 
wasn't going to be easy but she would make sure that it was done, and right 
as well.
But as she thought about that ship she couldn't help but wonder what prowl 
was up to and what he was doing at the moment, hoping that he was alright.
The last she had seen of him was running out to defend the ship with 
Kluster, and she hadn't seen him since.
She just hoped he was OK.*

________________________:)

Zyber:

* The opening to her den was just to her right, hidden under the snow 
covered branches of a pine that grew just outside the enterance.
It had taken her nearly three mega-cycles just to get this far, and if she 
hadn't had this stasis locked bot on her back she would have only been 1 
hour instead.
She staggered into the confines of her den and looked around, noting that it 
was more dusty then she had left it and needed to be cleaned.
But, first she had to get this bot off her back and she wasn't about to just 
leave him on the floor.
Zyber begin to slowly move towards the back of her cave where there was a 
smaller one, one that she liked to call her bed chamber.
It took her a good 5 mins to get to the opening of the second cave, looking 
around and finding just the place she had planned to set him.
It was a raised platform of rock with a bit of a dip in the middle, even 
furs placed along and over it to make quite a place to sleep on cold winter 
nights.
She finally made it over to her furs and then tilted her back, the great 
bulk of DeathSkyth ( don't mind if I spelled it wrong, please) sliding from 
her back and her sighing in relief.
Zyber hopped off the furs and quickly transformed into robot mode, moving 
the great beast so that he would be more comfortable when he awoke.
Then she quickly created a small fire in the center of the room so that it 
would no longer be cold, and a stasis locked bot could always benifit from 
heat while damamged.
Once the fire was alight and moved from the room and began to tidy up her 
den a bit while she got a few things ready for DeathSkyth.*
